name: first_last
abstract: Aggregate functions to return first or last "n" elements in a group
description: Provides first(anyelement), first(anyelement, int4), last(anyelement) and last(anyelement, int4) aggregates. Dual-argument aggregates return arrays of base type, while single-argument aggregats return just single value

first_last.abstract: Aggregate functions to return first or last "n" elements in a group
